column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text='' After playing football with my friends , I was all sweaty and dirty , so I decide I should take a bath .
#text=First I made sure there were clean towels available and enough soap and shampoo to thoroughly clean my skin and hair .
#text=I put the plug in the bottom of the bath tub and turned on the water , being careful to adjust the water to a nice warm , but no too hot , temperature .
#text=I used my finger to determine just the right temperature .
#text=After removing my clothes and placing them in the hamper , I carefully stepped into the tub , being sure to steady myself as I entered .
#text=I gingerly lowered myself into the nice warm water and immediately began to relax .

#text=After a few minutes of rest and relaxation , I got out the soap and thoroughly washed my whole body , making sure to get all of the dirt and grass stains off that I had accumulated from playing football .
#text=Next I washed my hair with shampoo and laid back into the water to really rinse it out well .
#text=I carefully exited the bath tub , making sure to step onto the bath mat so I would n't slip on the smooth floor tiles , and got a towel and dried myself off .
#text=Now my bath was complete and I felt so nice and clean !
